title: Dark Harvest Shaco is Unfair!
body:
Guys one time I was split pushing bot alone with jinx in a spiffy pair of berzerkers greaves and an assassin with .79% ban rate one shot me cuz he was fed and invisible. I had no way to counter play it. 

I dont know what how to play game if there is fed assassin. Riot will you please nerf shaco for me cuz his dark harvest is killing me cuz i don't know what to do about it. I cant see it to shoot him. At least if zed is coming over a wall you get to thiink about how bad you are for 1.5 seconds. Shaco killing me just is a puff of smoke and then im dead. Especially if im in the store shopping wtf. nerf 9x plz

wtf riot plz nerf shaco and remake it 9x and report it has .79% ban rate. khazix has a 50% ban rate plz buff khazix cuz hes the fair champion if you nerf a duskblade :) 

Thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Shaco in general is just broken. The only counter is predicting where he will go and warding.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sEiGq4Bv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-28T05:00:02.979+0000)
>
> Shaco in general is just broken. The only counter is predicting where he will go and warding.

at least u can do that vs Shaco try doing it vs Kha when he evolves his R and is perma invis thrue the jungle OMEGALUL
